content:
Do people use/access GitHub on Android phones? If so, what do you use?

I've been using OctoDroid for quite a while. Its not perfect, but lets me easily browse and comment on issues, view code, etc. I used to use it for getting GitHub notifications too, but since GitHub's notifications beta was released I've been preferring it via their website directly.

I've tried a few other GitHub apps here and there but haven't found any that I like better than OctoDroid. Wondering if/what others use though in case there are other gems out there I've missed... :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
Same for me, I just use a web browser.

Hi, larsdesigns. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU
@StPaulTim++ nice video. Thank you so much
